newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: S.AFRICAN MARCH TRACTOR SALES SIX PERCENT UP YR/YR.
newsitem.headline: S.AFRICAN MARCH TRACTOR SALES SIX PERCENT UP YR/YR.

text.p: South African tractor sales were six percent up on a year ago in March at 452 units while first quarter sales were 14 percent ahead, the Agricultural Machinery Association said on Monday.
Sales of combine harvesters were disappointing at nine units in March against 30 a year ago, but reflected uncertainty as to what the summer crop prospects were likely to be, it said.
